item.title: Utilities Targeted in Cyberattacks Identified
item.description: Hackers homed in on smaller electricity providers in proximity to critical infrastructure; FBI investigating Read the full story here.

item.title: America's Electric Grid Has a Vulnerable Back Door--and Russia Walked Through It
item.description: A Wall Street Journal reconstruction of the worst known hack into the nation’s power system reveals attacks on hundreds of small contractors. Read the full story here.
